mapper.select: select * from (select t.jhlx, to_char(t.jhsj, 'yyyy-mm') jhsj, round(sum(t.sjl)/10000,2) sjl from znsjcl_sy_sjjh t where t.yxbz = 'Y' group by t.jhlx, to_char(t.jhsj, 'yyyy-mm')) order by jhsj asc

-- select t.bmsl,t.lsjl,t.bsl,t.zsjl,t.ppsjl,t.ppl from Znsjcl_dm_homefl t select count(distinct t.BM) bmsl -- 部门数量 ,count(distinct t.SJLX) lsjl --数据类别 ,count(distinct t.SJYB) bsl --表数量 ,sum(t.YBSJL) zsjl --数据总量 ,sum(nvl(t.YDYPPL,0)+nvl(t.RGPPL,0)+nvl(t.QSIYDDPPL,0)+nvl(t.QSYDDPPL,0)) ppsjl-- 完成匹配条数 ,round(sum(nvl(t.YDYPPL,0)+nvl(t.RGPPL,0)+nvl(t.QSIYDDPPL,0)+nvl(t.QSYDDPPL,0))/sum(t.YBSJL)*100,2) ppl --匹配率 from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t
select distinct t.bm from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t
select distinct t.sjlx from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t
select distinct t.sjlx, t.sjyb from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t where t.sjyb is not null
select t.sjlx,t.sjyb,sum(nvl(t.ybsjl,0)) ybsjl from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t where t.sjyb is not null group by t.sjlx,t.sjyb order by sum(nvl(t.ybsjl,0)) desc

select t.sjlx,t.sjyb, sum(nvl(t.ydyppl,0)+nvl(t.rgppl,0)+nvl(t.qsiyddppl,0)+nvl(t.qsyddppl,0) ) ybsjl from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t where t.sjyb is not null group by t.sjlx,t.sjyb order by sum(nvl(t.ydyppl,0)+nvl(t.rgppl,0)+nvl(t.qsiyddppl,0)+nvl(t.qsyddppl,0)) desc
select a1.bm,a2.imgname,a1.sjl,a2.bgstyle from ( select t.BM, sum(nvl(t.SJL, 0)) sjl from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t group by t.BM order by sum(nvl(t.SJL, 0)) desc ) a1, sjzl_wbsjb_bmlist a2 where a1.bm=a2.bm

select a1.bm,'数据量' wd,round(a1.sjl/10000,2) sjl from ( select t.BM, sum(nvl(t.YBSJL, 0)) sjl from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t group by t.BM order by sum(nvl(t.YBSJL, 0)) desc ) a1, sjzl_wbsjb_bmlist a2 where a1.bm=a2.bm
select t.sjlx BM, t.YBSJL sjl from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t , sjzl_wbsjb_bmlist t1 where t.bm=t1.bm and t.bm like '%${bmmc}%' and t.YBSJL >0 order by t.YBSJL desc
select t.bm BM, sum(t.ybsjl) SJL from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t group by t.bm

select round(sum(to_number(t.YBSJL))/10000,2) ZSJL, round((sum(to_number(t.YDYPPL)) + sum(to_number(t.YDYPPHS)) + sum(to_number(t.RGPPL)) + sum(to_number(t.RGPPHS)) + sum(to_number(t.QSYDDPPL)) + sum(to_number(t.QSYDDPPHS)) + sum(to_number(t.QSYDDPPL)) + sum(to_number(t.QSYDDPPHS))) / 10000, 2) ZCGS, --总成功数 round(sum(nvl(t.YDYPPL, 0) + nvl(t.RGPPL, 0) + nvl(t.QSIYDDPPL, 0) + nvl(t.QSYDDPPL, 0)) / sum(t.YBSJL) * 100, 2) PPL, --匹配率 count(distinct t.BM) BMSL, --部门数量 count(distinct t.SJLX) SJLB, --数据类别 count(distinct t.sjyb) BSL --数据量 from sjzl_wbsjb_zyml t

select k.modelname,k.counts,k.rn from (select p.modelname, p.counts, rownum rn from (select r.* from (select t.modelname, count(1) counts from znsjcl_dm_datacloud t where 1 = 1 group by t.modelname) r order by r.counts desc) p) k where k.rn <= 20
